comments.body:
@t-henri It looks like this method operates on absolute artifact paths. Instead, it should operate on relative paths. Each artifact repository has an artifact root, and various filesystem operations are performed on paths relative to this root (for the file store, the root is available as `self._artifact_dir`).

In this case, we can probably make `artifact_path` an optional argument; if unspecified, all artifacts *under* the root are deleted.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +98,102 @@        artifact_path = os.path.join(self._artifact_dir, artifact_path) if artifact_path \
            else self._artifact_dir
        shutil.rmtree(local_file_uri_to_path(artifact_path))
